commits.message:
Remove euserv-migrate-instances --stop-source

ModifyService requests are not reliable.  As a result, the --stop-source
option to euserv-migrate-instances may not actually stop the node
controller in question, leading to more instances appearing on it when
it is supposed to be going down for maintenance.  We could potentially
just enter a loop and keep trying until the service's state does change,
but at that point it is probably better done by euserv-modify-service or
the cloud administrator him/herself.

Since we're doing a backwards-incompatible change to admin tools anyway,
this commit simply removes the --stop-source option.  People seem to
only rarely use the migration feature for its intended purpose anyway.

Fixes EUCA-9789
